Release Notes:

Former blink-182 co-founders Mark Hoppus and Travis Barker have reunited under
the aegis of a new band, (+44), and will release their much anticipated album,
When Your Heart Stops Beating on Interscope Records. The album is produced by
Hoppus and Barker and executive produced by long-time blink-182 producer Jerry
Finn.
